title: Adhesive Backed Gaskets
content: SRP has been providing custom converted adhesive backed gaskets and seals to various industries since 1951. We exceed customer expectations through exceptional customer service, quality manufacturing, competitive pricing and on-time delivery.
description: SRP has been providing custom converted adhesive backed gaskets and seals to various industries since 1951.

seo.title: Adhesive Backed Gaskets
seo.description: SRP has been providing custom converted adhesive backed gaskets and seals to various industries since 1951.

blocks.title: Choosing the right adhesive backed gasket:
blocks.content:
• Adhesion properties – What is the gasket sticking to?
  • Temperature capabilities – What temperature range is required?
  • Chemical compatibility – Will the gasket be exposed to any chemicals?
  • UV resistance – Will the gasket be exposed to outdoor elements?
  • Special properties – Electrically/thermally conductive, flame retardant?

blocks.title: Benefits
blocks.content:
• Attach gaskets to metal, plastic, glass, wood and more
  • Peel and stick for quicker assembly times
  • Gasket positioning
  • Add dimensional stability
  • Can be supplied kiss-cut on a roll for even quicker assembly
  • Mounting displays, signs, posters, mirrors, name-plates

blocks.title: Typical Materials Used for Adhesive Backed Gaskets
blocks.content:
• 3M Adhesive Transfer Tapes
  • PORON 4701-30 Polyurethane
  • BISCO HT-800 Silicone Foam
  • Closed Cell Sponge Rubber Gaskets
  • Ensolite Closed Cell Foam
  • HyPUR-cel Polyurethane Foam
  • Griswold Open Cell Sponge

blocks.title: Applications
blocks.content:
• Gasketing & Sealing
  • Bonding & Attaching
  • LED Lighting
  • Thermal Solutions
  • Cushioning
  • Battery Pads & Cushions
  • Gap Filling
  • Shock Absorption & Vibration Control

suppliers.title: Adchem Corporation
suppliers.content: Adchem adhesive tapes have been helping customers since 1965: tried and true PSA tape products from a growing selection of standard items, strategic, problem solving ideas from their application engineers.Hundreds of off-the-shelf proven products supported by:Expert applications analysisTechnical Service testingProactive testing and publication of bonding systems for new foams, finishes, and LSE substratesEngineered variations to standard products employing:50 different rubber and acrylic adhesives with caliper variations, alternate liners, and new carriersEngineered new product design and developmentProven development process with hundreds of applications based on detailed substrate, application, fabrication, evaluation and logistics analysis R&D and executive level collaborative project management

suppliers.title: Avery Dennison
suppliers.content: FT EZ-8Avery Dennison™ FT EZ-8 is ideal for applications requiring initial lamination to polyether or polyester foams and temporary removability from the user substrate.FeaturesDifferent rubber based adhesive on each side of a polyester carrierDensified kraft release linerBenefitsExcellent processing and die-cutting stabilityUnwind adhesive excellent for foam bondingLiner side adhesive provides short term removability from most metal surfacesConstructionLiner: 80# White KraftAdhesive 1: RubberCarrier: PolyesterAdhesive 2: Rubber
suppliers.description: A Global Leader in Materials Science and Manufaturing

suppliers.title: 3M
suppliers.content:
The benefits of being a 3M Preferred Converter:

  • Access to High-Performance Products – 3M is the leader in creating products, such as 3M™ VHB™ Foam Tape, that improve lives, enhance homes, and inspire the innovation of tomorrow.
  • Employee Training – The 3M Converter University provides us extensive knowledge on 3M products and technologies.
  • Networking – Using 3M’s extensive network allows us to work more efficiently in all areas of our business.
  • Extended Customer Benefits – We receive discounts and favorable lead times, which we extend to our customers.
  • Advisory Board Membership – SRP is on the 3M Advisory Board for Converter Markets.
  • 3M Innovation Center – We have access to the 3M Innovation Center in St. Paul, MN to give our customers a look at 3M’s new and existing technologies.
  • Support – As a Preferred Converter, SRP is supported by a team of 3M sales representatives.

From repositionable to permanent, 3M adhesive tape can be readily matched to the substrate and stress characteristics needed in the joint. Our custom fabricated 3M adhesives and tapes products can provide many solutions to countless applications using an array of different types of materials by converting them into custom gaskets and seals.
suppliers.description: Over 50 years working with 3M gives us the opportunity to provide you VIP service from material sampling to prototyping—to full manufacturing, packaging, and delivery.
